title: PCB Design & Layout
description: High-speed, mixed-signal, and RF PCB designs. From schematic capture to manufacturing-ready Gerbers. We specialize in impedance control, EMI/EMC optimization, and multilayer stacks (4-12+ layers).

title: PCB Manufacturing Support
description: Seamless transition to production. We generate precise Gerber files, create optimized BOMs, and perform rigorous DFM checks to ensure your board is ready for the fab house.

title: Firmware & Prototyping
description: Bare-metal and RTOS firmware for STM32, ESP32, and nRF52. We build and debug the first prototypes in our lab.

title: Web Development
description: Modern, high-performance web applications to interface with your hardware. React, Node.js, and Cloud Infrastructure integration.

title: Mobile App Development
description: Native and Cross-platform mobile apps for iOS and Android. Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) integration specialists.
